comment._content: On the Great Northern Railway. Photo by Brown Photo Co., St. Paul, Minnesota.

comment.author: 43791776@N00
comment._content:
Wystan, 

Do you know what the function of a press car was? This is the engraving section. It looks like the produced the master sheets for printing. Was a whole newspaper production facility in different cars? 

And why would it need be on a train? Is this the equivalent of the mobile truck with the satellite dish on top? :-)
